video_caption: The video begins with a black silhouette of a person standing with one hand on their hip against a gradient gray background. The scene transitions to a blue screen with white text that reads "WHAT IS & HOW TO PRAY ISTIKHARA PRAYER." Following this, a hand holding a marker appears, writing "IN THE NAME OF ALLAH, THE MOST BENEFICIENT, THE MOST MERCIFUL" in English and Arabic on a white background, accompanied by a blue cloud and a gift box illustration. The hand then writes "SALATUL-ISTIKHARA (THE ISTIKHARA PRAYER)" and draws a crescent moon with a silhouette of a person in prayer inside it. The hand continues to draw a person with question marks above their head, symbolizing contemplation, and a person standing on a platform with arrows pointing in different directions, representing decision-making. The video concludes with the hand drawing a house, a group of people in protective suits around a box, and a person in a suit, illustrating various aspects of life and decision-making in the context of the Istikhara prayer.

Surrounding the text are several images: a person with question marks above their head, a crescent moon with a silhouette of a person praying, a house, a figure at a crossroads, a gift box, a pair of wedding rings, and a group of people around a box. A hand holding a marker appears and starts drawing over the illustrations, adding details to the person with question marks, the house, and the figure at the crossroads. The video continues with the hand drawing a person sitting at a desk with a book, adding more details to the illustrations. The hand then draws a person with a beard and a question mark above their head, adding more details to the illustrations. The video concludes with the hand drawing a person with a beard and a question mark above their head, adding more details to the illustrations. Throughout the video, the background remains white, and the illustrations and text are the main focus.
